data.title: Who is on Your Distribution List?
data.meta_description: We distribute press releases to more than 30,000 journalists at all the African American newspapers and magazines, TV stations, and radio stations. Here are some of the news outlets on our distribution list: Newspapers/ Magazines: Advocate, Florida African Magazine, National Africana.com, National African-American Voic
data.text:
We distribute press releases to more than 30,000 journalists at all the African American newspapers and magazines, TV stations, and radio stations.

Here are some of the news outlets on our distribution list:
